definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Our products are unique in style and various in color.
sentences.chinese: 公司產品風格獨具，獨樹一幟，花色品種繁多。

sentences.english: You can discard loser in the side suit that the dummy is short of.
sentences.chinese: 你可以墊掉明手所缺少的旁套花色中的輸張。

sentences.english: We have a good assortment of goods to choose from.
sentences.chinese: 本公司貨色齊全，花色多樣，任憑挑選。

sentences.english: You shimmer in flowery dresses, and paisley ties are a must for male Bulls.
sentences.chinese: 而花色服裝配以螺旋花紋的領帶是男性牛兒的首選哦。

sentences.english: Sichuan Province is rich in building stone resources with a variety of colours and designs of hight quality.
sentences.chinese: 四川省石材資源十分豐富，花色品種多，質地很好。

sentences.english: Two methods can be used to detect the content of anthocyanins, one is the color value, the other is the productivity.
sentences.chinese: 目前，多采用色價法或產率法進行花色苷含量的測定。

sentences.english: Or we can look for a card of a given face or suit.
sentences.chinese: 或者可以查找指定牌面或花色的牌。

sentences.english: Anthocyanins of blueberry is a kind of main functional activity components of the blueberry.
sentences.chinese: 藍莓花色素苷是藍莓果的一種主要活性成分。

sentences.english: These results demonstrated that three cryptochrome genes are involved in the promotion of flowering time in rice.
sentences.chinese: 說明三個隱花色素基因都具有促進水稻開花的作用。

sentences.english: Anthocyanins 1 and 2 are not found in blueberries or cranberries.
sentences.chinese: 花色苷1和2都沒有出現在藍莓或蔓越梅。

sentences.english: They have many symbols, depending on their colors.
sentences.chinese: 根據花色的不同，它們有很多的象徵意義。
倉庫遊蕩沒有一個花色貨品。

sentences.english: The emergence of ACP can provide intense coloration in the vacuole.
sentences.chinese: 花色苷體的存在可導致液泡的強烈色彩。

sentences.english: The anthocyanidins discovered in the purple tubers are the most diverse.
sentences.chinese: 紫色塊莖所含的花色素種類最爲多樣化。

sentences.english: Our company produce and provide all kinds of ceramic products of various colors of a long-term.
sentences.chinese: 我廠長期生產各種規格各種花色陶瓷產品。

definition: Jacquard weave (machine weaving leaving protruding pattern)
